post.body: BTW, Ethan's favorite Xmas gifts were the WWE socks. Classic! Jack loved is hoodie too, but we had to exchange for larger size.
OK, I'll try to be supportive instead of subverssive. She is signed up to run a half marathon at Disney in March.
any flats in Hawaii yet?
4 days w/o pop now for Cheryl. She's hanging in there. I keep trying to get her to change her mind. I am a bad influence. Luv DC
I didn't know Jim, but I just ran 5.6 miles in 14 degrees in his honor. God bless him.
Wow, you are a remarkable photographer. You capture the unique beauty of the Hill Country so well. Impressive work. Thanks!
BTW, I went with Zeppelin, Styx, and Willie.
Played a fun game at the party...pick from 2 artists: AC/DC or Led Zeppelin..REO or STYX..Lyle Lovett or Willie Nelson? Tough!
Well, its down to 10 outside. I am not digging this weather at all. Gig went well.
Good day tweeters. Much to do. Grocery shopping, then a violin gig this afternoon. Party at the Borgmeyers tonite. And everyting in between.
Goodnight.
Wrapping presents, listening to Villa Lobos guitar etudes.
Most of the ice melted, so I got to run outside this afternoon! Man it felt good. 5.6 miles full of hills, about 25 degrees. Perfect.
Trying to figure out what to have for dinner. Cheryl is not feeling good. Kids had grilled cheese and soup. Chipotle perhaps??? Frito pie:)
Stopped into McFaddens for lunch.
Running errands with Jack and Ethan. Just hit Blockbuster.
Friday is trash/recycle pick-up day. Coffee is great as usual. I make great coffee, so let's just get that understood right now!
"There's no easy way to be free". Another great lyric, and it's a truth in life as well.
"I had no reason to be over optimistic, but somehow when you smile I can brave bad weather". Great lyric, great band.
Had a drink with John and Sherri. Jack watched Indiana Jones/Crystal Skull. Bout to go to bed.
I am having a quiet moment to twitter and surf.
Had fun at the rec center. Played bball, ran on the treadmill and rode the bike to nowhere, then hit the weights. Leftover spaghetti now.
Freezing rain coming! Going to the gym with the kids now.
I can't imagine a coconut cream pie being better than a frito pie.
I went to Pillow Elementary in Austin, and the lunch ladies made the best freakin' FRITO PIE! Booya!
There are so many possibilities, and I am alive with wonderment. I don't know why, but this twitter thing really is exciting to me!
Good night!
Went for a swim. Now I am starving, need a snack. Go Horns in the 4th qtr.
BTW, if I had not mentioned it before, my youngest son Ethan is a HHHHHHHHHHuge WWE fan. Off the charts. Tonite is Monday Nite Raw.
Finished with dinner. Going to watch the UT game with the kids for awhile. I plan to go to the gym later and swim 1000 yards.
Gotta go to the grocery store to get something for dinner, pretty much a daily venture for me. Did a 7.2 mile run this afternoon, very nice.
Just registered for the Austin Marathon. Glad to be returning after having such a fun run there last year. It's a great event.
Taking Jack to the orthodontist. Cold this morning, but sunny and bright blue sky...beautiful!
Watched Cold Case, ran 2 more miles, got kids to bed, ate a snack, watched ESPN, now twittering goodnight. Oh, and did some laundry.
Dinner was very good. Now some quiet time for me before we have to get the kids to bed. Might go out for a short run too.
Just back from playing basketball with the kids. Gettting dinner ready now..grilled salmon, garlic mashed spuds, salad, bread, and VINO!
Went to lunch at Maguey's after church. Home now doing some work and watching the playoffs. Kids are running around.
Just back from a run in the cold, 14 degrees. But it was fun. Getting ready to go to church now.
Woke up to a cold morning. Making coffee, twittering, and reading the paper.
Watching the colts/chargers game. Just had some Crown Royal with my neighbor John...smooth! Thinking about another 11 mile run in the am.
